channel.title: ConquestX v3 || Pi || Work in progress ||
channel.description:
Hello guys! I'm back again with another release of my source! There have been several changes to v3
-Totally different base
-Added in all items from the old server
-Added in new models for pernix, virtus, torva, and much more.
-Added in a Christmas Event. (Npc for Santa is 8540. feel free to change the dialogue.)
-Added in Control Panel (needs to be fixed)
-Disabled drops you can re add it if you fix the dupe. (will work on it in v4)
-Disabled Duel Arena. found a dupe in it. (will work on it in v4)
-Added in ::experiments
-Changed Home teleport to lumbridge (I am trying to convert make the home and npcs how it is in runescape. You can Change it if you want.
Pictures:
http://prntscr.com/2c98ua
http://prntscr.com/2c9a81
http://prntscr.com/2c9aa6
http://prntscr.com/2c9ac8
http://prntscr.com/2c9ap0
http://prntscr.com/2c9awu
http://prntscr.com/2c9azy
http://prntscr.com/2c9b2x
http://prntscr.com/2c9b8k
http://prntscr.com/2c9ba3 _____________________________________________
Package: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/68058824/ConquestX.zip
(Cache Auto downloads. currently working at the moment but i suggest changing) Pm me for any help. _____________________________________________
Things that need to be fixed :
Fix the stats and emote tab. (stats tab is a little off with the stats so you have to re-aline it.) (emote tab is a little buggy you need to find the proper animations for *blow kiss and laugh*
I hope you enjoyed my release! i will get v4 out soon with bug fixes and hopefully everything working!

item.description:
@runerulr1 wrote:

Hello guys! I’m back again with another release of my source! There have been several changes to v3

-Totally different base

-Added in all items from the old server

-Added in new models for pernix, virtus, torva, and much more.

-Added in a Christmas Event. (Npc for Santa is 8540. feel free to change the dialogue.)

-Added in Control Panel (needs to be fixed)

-Disabled drops you can re add it if you fix the dupe. (will work on it in v4)

-Disabled Duel Arena. found a dupe in it. (will work on it in v4)

-Added in ::experiments

-Changed Home teleport to lumbridge (I am trying to convert make the home and npcs how it is in runescape. You can Change it if you want.

Pictures:

http://prntscr.com/2c98ua

(Cache Auto downloads. currently working at the moment but i suggest changing) Pm me for any help.

Things that need to be fixed :

Fix the stats and emote tab. (stats tab is a little off with the stats so you have to re-aline it.)
(emote tab is a little buggy you need to find the proper animations for blow kiss and laugh

I hope you enjoyed my release! i will get v4 out soon with bug fixes and hopefully everything working!
